programme.title: Zone of The Dead
programme.desc: A police-escorted prisoner transport supervised by Interpol sets off to Belgrade. The route leads the transport through Pancevo, where they encounter an ecological disaster and infected people who are trying to kill them.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 2
programme.desc: From the mysterious mutilation of the black dahlia up to the 2017 Delphi murders, no stone is left unturned in Dread: The Unsolved; A mysterious docuseries from Dread Central.

programme.title: Hoax
programme.desc: An investigative team travels deep into the remote Colorado wilderness after a group of young campers are viciously murdered by what may be Bigfoot.

programme.title: Eyes of the Dead
programme.desc: After a plague of zombies invades a familys once-peaceful hometown, the havoc they wreak is deadly. Eyes of the Dead is a zombie thriller that immerses the audience in a pulse-pounding, innovative survival experience. Relying heavily on practical special effects and a POV perspective, what you see on camera is what was filmed on that fateful day of the zombie invasion.

programme.title: The Curse of Audrey Earnshaw
programme.desc: A devout community suffering from a plague is torn apart by a beautiful young woman and the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.

programme.title: Day 13
programme.desc: When 17-year-old Colton is left to babysit his sister for the summer, he develops a crush on Heather, the beautiful girl who moved into a mysterious old house across the street. As he falls in love from afar, he witnesses her foster father grow increasingly threatening towards her. When Colton suspects the man belongs to a Satanic cult, and is preparing to ritually murder her, he resorts to desperate measures to intervene, only to learn the truth is more horrifying than he had ever imagined.

programme.title: Tainted
programme.desc: An ex-con with ties to the Russian mob and Aryan brotherhood yearns to escape his past life of violence but ultimately decides to undertake one last assignment to escape the Russian mob and earn his freedom.

programme.title: Zone of The Dead
programme.desc: A police-escorted prisoner transport supervised by Interpol sets off to Belgrade. The route leads the transport through Pancevo, where they encounter an ecological disaster and infected people who are trying to kill them.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: Based on a character from the successful horror anthology franchise All Hallowsâ€™ Eve, Art The Clown returns and sets his sights on three young women, along with anyone else that gets in his way.

programme.title: Tin Can
programme.desc: As the world faces a deadly plague, a scientist on the brink of a cure awakens imprisoned in a metal chamber.
